Top-3 Scripts:
so_11365401: for i in fld[1-5]
do

done

seq 5 | xargs -n1 -I{} cp pippo.txt fld{}

ul_264093: for i in A B C; do
   for j in "path2/${i}_"*/; do
      cp "$path1/$i/file.txt" "$j"
   done 
done

for i in A B C; do
   for j in "path2/${i}_"{1..3}/; do
      cp "$path1/$i/file.txt" "$j"
   done 
done
